btClient

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • btClient.Piece

  • public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is tasked with managing a single piece of the downloaded file. This includes writing blocks to the file and checking the piece's completeness and computing the piece's hash when complete
    Author:
    Cody

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Piece(int index, int size, int offset, java.io.File file)
      Creates a new piece object with the given parameters

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkHash(byte[] hash)
      Checks if a given hash is equal to this piece's hash;
      void clearBlocks()
      Sets all true values for blocks[] to false (used to set this piece for redownload if hash verification failed)
      int getDownloadAttempts()
      Gets the number of attempts that have been made to download this piece, a piece may have multiple attempts if one or more attempts have failed to verify its SHA-1 hash
      byte[] getHash()
      Gets the SHA-1 hash of the completed piece as a byte array
      int getIndex()
      Gets the integer index of the piece
      int getNextBlockIndex()
      Returns the index of the next incomplete block, returns -1 if all blocks are complete
      int getNextBlockOffest()
      Gets the file offset of the next block to be downloaded for this piece
      int getNextBlockSize()
      Gets the size of the next block that is to be downloaded and written for this piece
      int getOffset()
      Gets the file offset in bytes of the begining of where this piece begins
      int getSize() 
      void incrementAttempts()
      Increases the number of download attempts made by 1
      boolean isComplete()
      Checks whether the piece is completely downloaded
      void setComplete()
      Sets the complete value by checking if all blocks are downloaded
      void writeBlock(byte[] message)
      Writes the payload of the given message to the download file

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Piece

        public Piece(int index,
     int size,
     int offset,
     java.io.File file)
      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Creates a new piece object with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        index - Zero based index of the piece relative to other pieces of the file
        size - Size the piece in bytes
        offset - The offset to the begining of this piece in the file, in bytes
        file - the file to which this piece is to be saved
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • Method Detail

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete()
        Checks whether the piece is completely downloaded
        Returns:
        True if piece is complete, otherwise false

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Gets the integer index of the piece
        Returns:
        The zero based index of this piece relative to other pieces in the file

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns:
        The size of the piece in bytes

      • getHash

        public byte[] getHash()
        Gets the SHA-1 hash of the completed piece as a byte array
        Returns:
        SHA-1 hash of the piece if completed, otherwise null

      • getOffset

        public int getOffset()
        Gets the file offset in bytes of the begining of where this piece begins
        Returns:
        File offset in bytes

      • getDownloadAttempts

        public int getDownloadAttempts()
        Gets the number of attempts that have been made to download this piece, a piece may have multiple attempts if one or more attempts have failed to verify its SHA-1 hash
        Returns:
        Number of attempts at downloading this piece

      • getNextBlockIndex

        public int getNextBlockIndex()
        Returns the index of the next incomplete block, returns -1 if all blocks are complete
        Returns:
        The zero based index of the next block to be downloaded

      • getNextBlockSize

        public int getNextBlockSize()
        Gets the size of the next block that is to be downloaded and written for this piece
        Returns:
        Block size in bytes

      • getNextBlockOffest

        public int getNextBlockOffest()
        Gets the file offset of the next block to be downloaded for this piece
        Returns:
        The file offset in bytes

      • setComplete

        public void setComplete()
        Sets the complete value by checking if all blocks are downloaded

      • incrementAttempts

        public void incrementAttempts()
        Increases the number of download attempts made by 1

      • writeBlock

        public void writeBlock(byte[] message)
                throws BtException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Writes the payload of the given message to the download file
        Parameters:
        message - message with payload to be written to file
        Throws:
        BtException - thrown if invalid message is passed
        java.io.IOException

      • checkHash

        public boolean checkHash(byte[] hash)
        Checks if a given hash is equal to this piece's hash;
        Parameters:
        hash - the SHA-1 hash that this piece is supposed to have
        Returns:
        True if hashes match, otherwise false

      • clearBlocks

        public void clearBlocks()
        Sets all true values for blocks[] to false (used to set this piece for redownload if hash verification failed)
